review: great game for the right price things just get a little tiresome and feels a little long in the tooth at certain points also save points are shrines and sometimes they feel kinda far from each other playing on a steam deck solves this issues since you can pause it and put it to sleep lol pacing issues aside this is still a fun arpg if you can get it for 20 or under then its a good value buy

a rare good remake i did a full playthrough including the postgame with riesz angela and hawkeye and had fun through all of it the combat is a blast fastpaced and the fast class progression keeps it fresh the story is pretty simple and most people seem to not care for it but i found it charming the oldschool game design is refreshing in a world where new rpgs feel the need to be bloated with unnecessary features
